notes: Contains: 8 action items, 3 decisions, 2 questions, 7 topics
All entities manually verified against transcript

citation.text_snippet: I'll send you the Swagger documentation after this meeting.
Today I need to implement the password reset flow.

action_items.text: Send calendar invite for Thursday test case review session

citation.text_snippet: Perfect. I'll send out the calendar invite.

action_items.text: Prepare rollback scripts as safety measure for deployment

citation.text_snippet: I will prepare the rollback scripts as a safety measure. That's assigned to me for tomorrow.

action_items.text: Create smoke test checklist for deployment

citation.text_snippet: Charlie, can you work with Diana to create a smoke test checklist for the deployment?

action_items.text: Update release plan document with deployment decisions

citation.text_snippet: I'll update the release plan document with these decisions.

action_items.text: Add deprecation warnings to legacy API response headers

citation.text_snippet: I need to add deprecation warnings to the API response headers.
Diana will send the test review invite for Thursday and complete the test case documentation.

decisions.text: Target Monday the 15th for production deployment
decisions.rationale: Based on backend ready by Friday, frontend by Wednesday, 3 days for regression testing

citation.text_snippet: We decided to target Monday the 15th for production deployment.

decisions.text: Use phased rollout approach for new authentication feature
decisions.rationale: Start with internal users, then expand to 10% of production traffic - aligns with testing strategy

citation.text_snippet: We agreed to use the phased rollout approach.

decisions.text: Keep legacy login endpoint running in parallel for at least two weeks

citation.text_snippet: We should keep it running in parallel for at least two weeks.

questions.text: Can we schedule a test case review session this week?

citation.text_snippet: Can we schedule a test case review session this week?

answer_citation.text_snippet: Let's go with Thursday afternoon for the review.

questions.text: What about the legacy login endpoint? Are we deprecating it immediately?
questions.answer_summary: Keep running in parallel for at least two weeks with deprecation warnings

citation.text_snippet: what about the legacy login endpoint? Are we deprecating it immediately?

answer_citation.text_snippet: We should keep it running in parallel for at least two weeks. I need to add deprecation warnings to the API response headers.

topics.title: Daily Status Updates
topics.summary: Bob completed API authentication module, will work on database migration. Charlie completed login form UI, waiting on API docs.

topics.title: Test Planning
topics.summary: Diana drafted test cases for authentication flow. Team scheduled Thursday afternoon review session.

topics.title: Deployment Timeline Discussion
topics.summary: Backend ready by Friday, frontend by Wednesday, 3 days regression testing. Decision: Target Monday the 15th for deployment.

topics.title: Deployment Safety Measures
topics.summary: Bob will prepare rollback scripts. Charlie and Diana will create smoke test checklist.

topics.title: Feature Flag and Rollout Strategy
topics.summary: Decision: Use phased rollout - internal users first, then 10% production traffic. Alice to update release plan.

topics.title: Legacy Endpoint Handling
topics.summary: Decision: Keep legacy endpoint parallel for 2 weeks. Bob to add deprecation warnings.

topics.title: Meeting Recap and Action Items
topics.summary: Alice summarized all action items: Bob (API docs, rollback scripts, deprecation warnings), Charlie (password reset, smoke test), Diana (Thursday invite, test docs), Alice (release plan update).
